title: Putting the faith into Facebook: how millennials are modernising the Church of England
text:
Nick’s tongue would appear at the corner of his mouth whenever he filled in his worksheet. Rachel was not shy to repeatedly raise her hand and ask questions. Adam knew it all already but came along for a revision refresher. Meanwhile, Kath held her head in her hands and let out the occasional sigh.

Yet all these students, seated as they were in neat little rows - and occasionally letting out excited ‘Ah-Ha’s!’ - had long since graduated from school.

For the past year, the Church of England has secretly been running workshops in which millennials are training thousands of vicars around the UK how to use social media.

The Introduction to Digital scheme is part of the latest drive to modernise...
